      • copySilently

        public static long copySilently(InputStream inputStream,
                                OutputStream outputStream,
                                boolean closeStreams)
        Copies data.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - the input data
        outputStream - the output destination
        closeStreams - if true the streams will be closed otherwise they will stay open
        Returns:
        the length of copied data
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - if copying fails

      • copySilently

        public static long copySilently(InputStream inputStream,

                                InputStreamListener listener)
        Copies data.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - the input data
        outputStream - the output destination
        closeStreams - if true the streams will be closed otherwise they will stay open
        listener - a listener (may be null)
        Returns:
        the length of copied data
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - if copying fails

      • copySilently

        public static long copySilently(Reader reader,
                                Writer writer,
                                boolean closeReaderAndWriter)
        Copies characters.
        Parameters:
        reader - the reader
        writer - the writer
        closeReaderAndWriter - if true the reader and writer will be closed otherwise they will stay open
        Returns:
        the size of the characters
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - if copying fails
